casebody.data:
Rhodes, Appellant, v. Tate, Supt., Appellee.

[Cite as Rhodes v. Tate (1988), 35 Ohio St. 3d 266.]

(No. 88-18 Decided March 16, 1988.)

For the reasons stated in the decision and judgment entry of the court of appeals below, case No. 1462, filed December 2, 1987, the dismissal of appellant’s petition for a writ of a habeas corpus is hereby affirmed.

Moyer, C. J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur,
